title: Deals: M1 Pro MacBook Pros $200 off, iPad Air 4 clearance, iPhone 12/mini from $400, more
content:
Kicking off the week, all of today’s best deals are now headlined by Apple’s latest M1 Pro MacBook Pros at Amazon lows. That’s alongside $299 off iPhone 12/mini handsets and the first wave of clearance offers on the iPad Air 4. Hit the jump for all that and more in the latest 9to5Toys Lunch Break.

more…

The post Deals: M1 Pro MacBook Pros $200 off, iPad Air 4 clearance, iPhone 12/mini from $400, more appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: M1 Pro MacBook Pros have fallen to Amazon all-time lows at $200 off alongside iPad Air 4 clearance and more.
